fields.title: Answer:
fields.value:
$BOND Hodl Pool was launched on Nov 16th, 2020. It has been running for 12 epochs (weeks) and distributing 60,000 $BOND tokens in rewards to the users. 

$BOND Hodl Pool ended on Feb 8th, 2021. If you haven’t claimed your rewards or withdrawn your deposit yet - don’t panic. You’ll be able to do that for literally forever but you will no longer be able to stake and earn rewards from the pool.
